text: Sofiane A誰ssaoui (b. August 23 1991 in Revin, France) is a French mixed martial artist. He is nicknamed "The Lion", A誰ssaoui fights in the welterweight division. He has been the WFC amateur MMA world champion and Grappling world champion. A誰ssaoui won three French championship titles, two in Karate mix and one in Pancrase. == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:French mixed martial artists Category:Ardennes (department) Category:Sportspeople from Grand Est
